content: skill level | beginner finished size | 7″ wide laying flat 11″ long if you haven t crocheted anything before and you want to know where to begin you re in the right place the beginner crochet leg warmers pattern here at b hooked is a great first crochet project through this project you ll learn the fundamentals of crochet projects the chain stitch the slip_stitch and the double_crochet stitch you can learn each of these skills individually but here we believe new skills stick when incorporated into a project you can enjoy
